H3.text: when did the flash first appear on arrow. second season

A4.text: the character, portrayed by Grant Gustin, was set to appear in three episodes of season two of Arrow, with the final one acting as a backdoor pilot for the new series

A5.text: However, it was announced in November 2013 that the backdoor pilot would not be happening, with a traditional pilot being made instead
